entry.title: 24 Oras News Alert: 6 areas under Signal No. 3 as #AmboPH targets Samar provinces

media:group.media:title: 24 Oras News Alert: 6 areas under Signal No. 3 as #AmboPH targets Samar provinces
media:group.media:description:
Six areas were placed under Signal No. 3 as Typhoon Ambo maintained its strength as it targets the Samar provinces, according to PAGASA on Thursday noon. Ambo is seen to make landfall over Northern Samar or the northern portion of Eastern Samar between 12 noon and 2 p.m. on Thursday, PAGASA said.
